keyPolicies.policyDescription: Acting on debt to keep the cost of living low and create jobs.
Support and strengthen our local NHS in Hammersmith & Shepherds Bush.
Make Britain the most family friendly country in Europe.
Raise standards in schools - freeing teachers to teach and creating new smaller schools.
Only the Conservatives will scrap Labour’s third runway.
If the Conservatives don’t win Hammersmith, Britain will have five more years of Gordon Brown.

issues.economy: Acting on debt to keep the cost of living low and create jobs.
issues.education: Raise standards in schools - freeing teachers to teach and creating new smaller schools.
issues.health: Support and strengthen our local NHS in Hammersmith & Shepherds Bush.

leaflet.personalStatement: Shaun is not a career politician - he's spent 20 years in community work. Straight speaking - Shaun always tells it how it is. Shaun will always represent you in Parliament, not Parliament in Hammersmith.
leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on presenting Shaun Bailey as a non-career politician with 20 years in community work, emphasizing a personal connection to the constituency and specific policy proposals on economy, health, family, education, and transportation.
